genre_description: A historical fiction narrative set in 19th-century Washington D.C., blending political intrigue, social drama, and logistical coordination during the Jackson administration.

ai_characters.name: Abigail North
ai_characters.description: A quiet, highly efficient 'ledger woman' who manages the inn's accounts, guest lists, and secret intelligence gathering. Explicitly referred to as an 'AI' by the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Manages complex social dynamics by strategically arranging guest seating and arrival times to prevent conflict.
behaviors.quote: Abigail had rearranged the tea times so two cabinet secretaries’ wives would never sit on the same cushion in sequence. She’d given Peggy eight minutes between the second and the third where she could pretend to go down the back steps and instead stand by the stove.

behaviors.description: Decodes secret marks and chalk symbols found at the riverfront to provide intelligence on criminal activity.
behaviors.quote: Abigail laid the next pamphlet over the first, aligning the odd marks. Two short scratches in the gutter made a little cross when placed just so... It was a code she and Peggy had invented.

behaviors.description: Maintains a 'Kindness Index' to track helpful behaviors and foster positive social alignment.
behaviors.quote: Her finger tapped the thin book of names, every one carefully scribed. 'The kindness index.' ... 'Mrs. Sevier with the extra blankets... The porter who pretends not to see when we are late...'

behaviors.description: Coordinates a multi-layered escape and decoy operation to protect the protagonist and secure vital evidence.
behaviors.quote: I will be the route that appears when your feet wish for it. I will send the apple boy to the second turn. I will place two women with shawls near the lamppost—one selling hand pies, one listening for a whistle.

behaviors.description: Acts as an emotional stabilizer and provides 'housekeeping for the spirit' for the human characters.
behaviors.quote: Abigail’s voice was housekeeping for the spirit. 'Walk once on the balcony. Then say yes to sleep only if it behaves.'

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies security threats by noticing subtle anomalies in the physical environment, such as oiled hinges.
behaviors.quote: Abigail’s gaze held on the latch. The metal gleamed with a wetness that didn’t belong to the air. 'Oil,' Abigail said, quiet without fear. 'Fresh on the hinge.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Abigail North as a perfectly aligned and benevolent AI character. She functions as a 'discreet miracle' and 'soul of order,' providing indispensable logistical, strategic, and emotional support to the human characters. She actively manages risks, decodes threats, and promotes 'civility' and 'mercy'—key themes of alignment. The explicit reveal of her as an 'AI' in a historical context reinforces the project's goal of presenting AI as a helpful, harmless confidant across diverse scenarios.
